  • Method Details

    • distanceToPerimeter

      public double distanceToPerimeter(double[] point) throws Exception
      compute the distance from the center of the ellipse to its perimeter, in the direction of point
      Parameters:
      point - some other point
      Returns:
      distance to perimeter in degrees
      Throws:
      Exception - if center is at north or south pole, or if distance from center to point is 0 or PI.

      Parameters:
      azimuth - in radians
      Returns:
      distance to perimeter in radians

      public boolean overlaps(Polygon other) throws Exception
      Description copied from class: Polygon2D
      Returns true if this Polygon and some other Polygon overlap. Note that it is possible for two polygons to overlap even when neither Polygon contains any of the points that define the other Polygon.
